General.Name: SAMYUNG ENC Co. Ltd
General.Description: SAMYUNG ENC Co., Ltd. provides marine time communication equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company offers automatic ship identification systems; and global maritime distress and safety systems, including medium frequency/high frequency radio transceiver, digital selective call/very high frequency (VHF) radio, NAVTEX, search and rescue radar transponder, and handheld VHF radio systems, as well as radio beacon system for emergency positioning. It also provides communication products, such as SSB radio transceiver, weather facsimile, VHF radio, satellite TV and VSAT antenna, handheld VHF radio, and other products. In addition, the company offers navigation systems comprising chart plotters/fishfinders, radars, and others; fishing systems; and auto pilot systems, as well as consulting, marketing, designing, and constructing management services and solutions. Further, it is involved in the leisure boat equipment, and land and sea facilities construction businesses. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
